EditedNodes.EditedNode: 37% increased Armour 4% additional Physical Damage Reduction

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Level 1: Freezing Pulse - Arcane Surge
Level 4: (after Tidal Island) Holy Flame Totem - Summon Phantasm Summon Raging Spirits Flame Wall - Arcane Surge - Frost Blink
Level 8: (Lower Prison WP) Holy Flame Totem - Summon Phantasm - Combustion Summon Raging Spirits - Infernal Legion - Minion Dmg Flame Wall - Arcane Surge - Frost Blink Raise Zombie
Level 10: (After Brutus) +Vitality +Smoke Mine Flame Wall - Arcane Surge - Flame Dash (this 3 link is 3rd in priority after SRS > Flame Totem)
Level 12: (Merveil's Lair) +Flesh Offering
Level 16: +Desecrate +Skitterbots
Level 18: Zombies - Minion Speed - Melee Phys
Level 24: +Convocation Dread Banner (level up in offhand) Pride (level up in offhand)
Level 28: Raise Spectre (level up in offhand) Vulnerability (level up in offhand)
1st 4 Link: Summon Raging Spirits - Infernal Legion - Minion Dmg - Elemental Focus
Level 31: (Library Quest) Zombies - Feeding Frenzy - Melee Phys + Generosity (level up in offhand) + Impale (level up in offhand)
Level 34: (this should be what your setup looks like at this point - drop holy flame totem) Carrion Golem - Minion Damage - Melee Phys > Maim Summon Raging Spirits - Infernal Legion - Minion Dmg - Elemental Focus Zombies - Feeding Frenzy - Melee Phys - Minion Life Dread Banner - Generosity - Pride - Skitterbots (drop vitality) Convocation - Smoke Mine - Desecrate Vulnerability - Flame Dash - Flesh Offering ------ Chaos Golem (level up in off hand) - Stone Golem - (level up in offhand) Raise Spectre (level up in offhand) - Vulnerability (level up in offhand) Impale (level up in offhand)
Level 38: Carrion Golem - Minion Damage - Melee Phys - Multistrike Zombies - Feeding Frenzy - Melee Phys - Maim
Lilly in Act 6: Carrion Golem - Impale - Brutality - Multistrike Minion Damage (level up in offhand)
Drop the Summon Raging Spirits Setup once you have 2 Clayshapers. At that points just focus on casting flesh offering and vulnerability and picking up the following 4 link
Raise Spectre - Blood Magic - Minion Life - Meat Shield (2x Stygian Silver back from Act 2 the riverways or if you're at at 7+ then 2x Carnage Chieftains from Act 7 The Ashen Fields)
EXTRA BITS
Leveling Loot Filter https://www.pathofexile.com/item-filter/gdyzyIE

Tabula 6 Link https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/NK6Ec5
Primordial Might https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/bGyacL
Primordial Eminence https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/NkO3T5
Primordial Harmony https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/1JDJIl
Medium Cluster Jewel to craft on https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/Y9OOnmOcY
Large Cluster Jewel to craft on https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/6oBBaO0CG
Darkness Entrhoned https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/rmwggHQ
Minion Jewels https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/yXM4OrsR
Cheap 6 Links https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Standard/Zqlk7PbHQ
